text: Ulrica Persson, born 7 March 1975, is a Swedish cross-country skier. She won the women's main competition of Vasaloppet in the years of 2001 and 2003. She also won Tjejvasan in 2003. ==References== == References == ==Other websites== *FIS Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish skiers
title: Ulrica Persson
